subject: Basketball (College)
Fantasy Sports
Advertising and Marketing
Gambling
lead_paragraph: Despite a court hearing that could determine the company’s ability to operate in the state, FanDuel is the title sponsor of the Legends Classic, a college basketball event at Barclays Center.
snippet: Despite a court hearing that could determine the company’s ability to operate in the state, FanDuel is the title sponsor of the Legends Classic, a college basketball event at Barclays Center.
